<h1 align="center">
  audiophil music production
</h1>

## Overview

### 1. About this project

German recording studio website for audiophil music prodction to showcase its construction details and document the building progress as blog. Made with [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/) and [React](https://reactjs.org/).

### 2. Features

- Blazing fast page transitions with Gatsby.
- Blog content managed and fetched from WordPress
- 3D-Animation Hero Video made with [Sketchup](https://www.sketchup.com/) and [Animator](https://sketchucation.com/pluginstore?pln=Animator)
- [Netlify](https://www.netlify.com/) contact form handling

### 3. Live version

Visit the published live version on [https://www.audiophilproduction.de/](https://www.audiophilproduction.de/)
